release.action: The JMX names of all managed JIAC resources contains the unique ID instead the name of the corresponding agent node.
Moved all operational and management interfaces of agentCore to new module agentCoreAPI. Thus, agentCore is now only the implementation of this interfaces.
Flexible token-based authorisation for JIAC action invocations.
Enhanced execution cycle now supports parallel action execution.
Services are now reliably discovered if they are there, also cross-node.
SessionIds are now passed down to sub-services during service usage.
